lead_paragraph: Henrik Lundqvist was flipping mad that referee Trevor Hanson wouldn't blow his whistle to stop play. Run over by teammate Ryan McDonagh seconds earlier, the injured New York Rangers goaltender took the situation into his own hands and flipped the net over to get a stoppage.

headline.print_headline: Goaltending Fraternity Split Over Lundqvist's Outburst
headline.main: Goaltending Fraternity Split Over Lundqvist's Outburst
